title: Playlist - 70s
description: One of the images I made as coverart for a series of themed playlists while the Visual Design Artist for UCD Music Society. The aesthetic style was a mixture of surface level camp, with deeper imagery relating to the theme of the playlist. The theme of this playlist was 70s music and if I'm being honest, I was making like 12 of these a week as an extra curricular and after a while I was running out of ideas. I included this in the gallery because I still find it pretty funny.

title: Playlist - Committee Picks
description: This playlist consisted of two songs picked by each member of the UCD Music Society Committee. I had to do a new thumbnail for this playlist once a week, so after a while I got a bit delirious | One of the images I made as coverart for a series of themed playlists while the Visual Design Artist for UCD Music Society. The aesthetic style was a mixture of surface level camp, with deeper imagery relating to the theme of the playlists.

title: Lightning bug Asset
description: A lightning bug asset I used as marginalia for press releases the Music Society put out ( which I also made ). It's a composite of a vacuum tube that are used in amplifiers as the body with 16th notes as the wings

title: Music Society Logo
description: A logo I designed for the 11th Session of the UCD Music Society in 2020. I'm personally not a huge fan of the colour scheme, but that wasn't my decision. The logo is comprised of a record in the center of the bell of a gramophone, meant to look like a sunflower
